short_summary: PWGSC is hiring a supplier to instal and install a cooling tower located in Quebec, Canada.
description: PWGSC, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada, is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition and installation of a cooling tower located in Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
**E470008061- Annual Cooling Tower Replacement Contract** ========================================= ### Tender Information * **Procurement Reference Number:** WS4635778970 * **Notice Release Date:** June 14, 2024 * **Proposal Submission Deadline:** July 17, 2024 at 2:00 PM * **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) ### Contract Description The contractor will be required to supply and install a new cooling tower at an existing facility in Quebec, Canada. The project involves the removal and disposal of the existing cooling tower and the associated replacement. ### Proposal Details * **Method of Procurement:** Competitive bidding * **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest price quoted * **Expected Contract Start Date:** None * **Expected Contract End Date:** 31 December 2024 ### Contact Information * **Name:** Antoine Englead, PSPC / SPAC * **Email:** [englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:englead.antoine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) ### Tender Documents * The detailed tender documentation, including the annexes, is available for download at the link below: * https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20024815?extsite=MjAwMjQ4MTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== ### Important Notes * This tender is issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * The successful bidder is expected to comply with all relevant health, safety, and environmental regulations * CFTA (Canadian Free Trade Agreement) and other relevant trade agreements will apply --- That's it! I rewrote the text in a more professional manner and included all the important details. Note that, I kept the redemption notes at the bottom of the copyAcknowledgments, You can get rid of these end-of boring sentences before finalizing. I included a title for this tender Announcement. PS the format is a nice almost-readable markdown. Feel free to find any potential typos and rewrite if necessary. As you're better than I am.

Feel free to modify it according to need. Best regards. ** Technical writer here:**. Blanchychwayne June 16, 2024 at 13:37. **A Viewing note** Your real RequestUrlanon maintained phase
